thread.title: Mum accused of having sex with FIVE TEENAGERS in front of daughter at boozy party
thread.title_full: Mum accused of having sex with FIVE TEENAGERS in front of daughter at boozy party

author: Chris Murphy
title: Mum accused of having sex with FIVE TEENAGERS in front of daughter at boozy party
text:
News Mum accused of having sex with FIVE TEENAGERS in front of daughter at boozy party The apparent sex rampage took place at her home in Florida. Her own daughter is said to have seen some of the sex assaults Share Officials claim Jaimie Ayer had sex with a 16 and 17-year-old at her own house. Share Get daily   
A mum who was charged with having threesome sex with two underage teenagers at a booze party in front of her daughter is now charged with having sex with FIVE TEENAGERS. 
The apparent sex rampage took place at Jaimie Ayer's home in Florida. Her own daughter is said to have seen some of the sex assaults. 
Police in Florida are claiming the 40-year-old actively set out to seduce initially two boys of 16 and 17 for her own pleasure. 
ABC7 reports she told one of the original victims she needed to shower and he should come help her. ABC7 reports she told one of the original victims she needed to shower and he should come help her 
He was then led by hand to a bedroom by Ayer, where she began to remove her clothes and then give oral sex to the victim, the detective reported. 
Another juvenile said he also engaged in sexual activity with her at that time. 
Now, investigators have additionally charged her after THREE MORE alleged victims came forward. 
Investigators in the town of Bradenton say she used booze to help things along. Another juvenile said he also engaged in sexual activity with her at that time 
Local news channel WFLA reports the Bradenton mother is presently behind bars charged with having sex with the FIVE underage children. 
The police are claiming it happened just before Christmas, and has only just led to an arrest. 
The station said on December 23rd, officials claim Jaimie Ayer had sex with a 16 and 17-year-old at her own house. 
The investigation began after information surfaced that Ayer was providing minors alcohol and having sex with minors. 
According to an arrest affidavit, Ayer returned home to a group of students socializing and began providing alcohol to the minors. 
Investigators report that Ayer then engaged in sex acts with two of the teens along with the three additional lads. 
The defendantâ€™s daughter witnessed her mother engaged in some of the activity, the arrest affidavit stated. 
Ayer was arrested and taken to the Manatee County Jail where she is facing charges of sexual activity with underage minors. Like us on Facebook
